Most Illustrious and Excellent Sir

By virtue of the orders of Your Excellency Lieutenant Isaías with 24 men to surprise a guard of rebels said to be at Boa Vista, I shall spend this night with the remainder of the men on the other side to carry out the orders of Your Excellency Juca Custódio, who is moving around the hill of Fortaleza and Santa Cruz with more than 20 men.

This is all I have at present to bring to the knowledge of Your Excellency.

God keep Your Excellency. Santo Amaro, June 13, 1840.  
Most Illustrious and Excellent Sir Manuel Jorge Rodrigues, Lieutenant-General Commander-in-Chief of the Army.  
Francisco Pedro de Abreu.  
Lieutenant-Colonel.
